chunks.zh: 现在的大环境，好像很多事情都没有以前🔥（火热）了，貌似大家都没什么热情了❤️
chunks.en: In the current environment, it seems like many things aren't as hot as they used to be, and it seems like everyone has lost their enthusiasm ❤️

chunks.zh:
1. 前几年关注的一批博客都搜不到了
2. 很多群都没什么消息了，大家好像都变得沉默了，甚至连发擦边的图都变少了
3. 最神奇的是 B 站上有很多躺平博主，甚至还有组团躺平的，视频有很多播放量，这个现象真的。。。。
chunks.en:
1. A batch of blogs I followed a few years ago can't be found anymore.
2. Many groups don't have any new messages anymore, everyone seems to have become silent, and even sending borderline suggestive pictures has decreased.
3. The most amazing thing is that there are many "lying flat" (tang ping) bloggers on Bilibili, some even group up to lie flat, and their videos have a lot of views. This phenomenon is really...

chunks.zh: 合群是为了自保,孤独才是自由.
chunks.en: Conformity is for self-preservation, solitude is freedom.

chunks.zh: 擦边我直接英雄登场。爬虫爬的随便看，https://www.girls-rating.com
chunks.en: I'm the hero when it comes to borderline content. Check out the content crawled by the crawler at https://www.girls-rating.com

chunks.zh: 躺着看 P 站的人类也没减少啊，多大点儿事
chunks.en: The number of people lying down and watching P-site hasn't decreased, so what's the big deal?

chunks.zh: 因为 ai
chunks.en: Because of AI

chunks.zh: 因为年龄大了圈子不同
chunks.en: Because I'm older and in a different circle

chunks.zh: 技术也没有多大突飞猛进 所以就没热情了
chunks.en: There hasn't been much technological breakthrough, so there's no enthusiasm.

chunks.zh: 加的很多群还剩下 nga 羊毛群，男德学院，瑟图群每天打得火热，刚刚才发了一张瑟图🐶
chunks.en: Many of the groups I've joined are still active, including the NGA discount group, the Male Morality Academy, and the NSFW picture group, which are all very active every day. Someone just posted an NSFW picture 🐶

chunks.zh: 2024 年我就注意到很多躺平博主了，当时注意到的是乳山银滩。
chunks.en: I noticed many 'lying flat' bloggers in 2024, and at that time I noticed Rushan Silver Beach.

chunks.zh: 热情得有回报才能持续，不过不发色图这个不正常，非常不正常，我理解不了
chunks.en: Enthusiasm needs to be rewarded to continue, but not posting NSFW pictures is abnormal, very abnormal, I can't understand it.

chunks.zh: 增量转存量了，同步影响人类的思想和行为习惯。倒也不是说没有有趣的东西了，但总是少了一些意气风发和激情豪迈。
chunks.en: Incremental development has turned into a stock game, which affects human thoughts and behaviors synchronously. It's not that there are no interesting things, but there is less ambition and passion.

chunks.zh: 没错，很多人都觉得自己想的别人都没想到，但事实大环境下大家想的都差不多。所以很多不约而同的事情也越来越多，就像微信今年群发拜年的消息我是没收到几条，平常广告短信不停，但祝新年快乐的广告短信居然是 0 。
chunks.en: That's right, many people think that what they think is something no one else has thought of, but in reality, everyone is thinking similarly under the same environment. So many coincidental things are happening more and more. For example, I didn't receive many New Year greetings in WeChat groups this year. I usually get endless advertising SMS messages, but I received 0 SMS messages wishing me a Happy New Year.

chunks.zh: @echo1937 #6 你这么一说，我才注意已经还是 2025 年了，2024 这个几个数字貌似还没有看熟悉，就已经过去了。
chunks.en: @echo1937 #6 You're right, I just realized it's already 2025. It seems like I haven't gotten used to the numbers 2024 yet, and it's already passed.

chunks.zh: @Suaxi #5 我有一个朋友，他想看看是什么群，发一下链接
chunks.en: @Suaxi #5 I have a friend, he wants to see what group it is, please send the link.

chunks.zh: @xiaocongcong1 #10 这个现象也是，好像之前很多银行，运营商都会发一下生日短信，现在连生日短信也没有了，现在逢年过节更是没有收到过祝福短信。不知道是大环境不好，还是时代变了。
chunks.en: @xiaocongcong1 #10 This phenomenon too, it seems like many banks and telecom operators used to send birthday SMS messages, but now even birthday SMS messages are gone, and I haven't received any holiday greeting SMS messages during the Spring Festival. I don't know if it's because the environment is bad, or if times have changed.

chunks.zh: 经济下行，地产下行，技术无突破，就业形势不好
chunks.en: Economic downturn, real estate downturn, no technological breakthroughs, poor employment situation.

chunks.zh: 建议你加几个炒股群，每个工作日 9：30-15：00 ，消息多到爆了，上班都没空干活，光忙着看群聊了
chunks.en: I suggest you join some stock trading groups. From 9:30 to 15:00 every working day, there are so many messages that you don't have time to work, just busy looking at group chats.

chunks.zh: 你写出来的绝对不如 deepseek 写的。现在根本没写东西的必要了。不服的话你随便找个你最擅长的话题，我用 deepseek 回复你。看谁写的好。
chunks.en: What you write will definitely not be as good as what DeepSeek writes. There's no need to write anything now. If you don't believe me, find any topic you're best at, and I'll use DeepSeek to reply to you. Let's see who writes better.

chunks.zh: @TWorldIsNButThis 感觉就是 AI 影响范围太大了。1 个人可以全自动干 N 个人的活
chunks.en: @TWorldIsNButThis I feel that AI has too much influence. 1 person can automatically do the work of N people.

chunks.zh: 不不不，你这范围太小了，你仅限你们程序员圈吗？
chunks.en: No, no, no, your scope is too small, are you limited to your programmer circle?

chunks.zh: 过年在家族群里发了个红包，然后一个相应接续发的没有。。。
chunks.en: I sent a red envelope in the family group during the Chinese New Year, but no one sent one back...
